questions.question_text: What are two features of vSphere with Operations Management? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. Enables proactive identification of system issues through predictive analysis.
B. Allows reclaiming over provisioned capacity to increase resource utilization.

choices.A: Enables proactive identification of system issues through predictive analysis.
choices.C: Provides a secure portal for requesting new IT services.
choices.B: Allows reclaiming over provisioned capacity to increase resource utilization.

questions.question_text: Which datastore type can be extended to span several physical storage extents, including storage Area Network LUNs and local storage devices, in order to create a datastore that fits the needs of your virtual machines?

choices.C: Ensures minimum impact on network bandwidth.

discussion.content:
A. Creates new virtual machines.
C. Ensures minimum impact on network bandwidth.

questions.question_text: What are two advantages of using vSphere Data Protection In a data center? (Choose two.)

choices.B: The process of moving virtual machines from one .place to another
choices.A: The process of scaling applications and licenses to support multiple hosts
choices.C: The process of replicating virtual versions of physical components
choices.D: The process of creating virtual versions of physical components

discussion.content: D. The process of creating virtual versions of physical components
C. Zero - you don't need to have a network communication. No such requirement is present in the question
NIC varies from minimum 1 to max 4 so answer is 1
I think B answer is correct since minimum one NIC is required for network communication.....
i think one to communicate with other VM

questions.question_text: What is the minimum number of virtual NICs that you can configure for a virtual machine?
